question: Indiaâ€™s first Butterfly Park was established at which among the following National Parks?
explanation: Bannerghatta National Park was founded in the year 1970 and it was declared as a national park in 1974. It is located near Bangalore, Karnataka. The first butterfly enclosure in India is located in this National Park. Apart from that, the park has a zoo, an animal rescue centre, a snake house, a pet corner, an aquarium, and a safari park.
